findings: claude-flow exposes 87+ MCP tools via stdio transport
Vercel AI SDK provides createMCPClient for server-side integration
SvelteKit can use @ai-sdk/mcp package with HTTP or stdio transports
Hive-mind offers Queen-Worker coordination with 5+ agent types
Integration requires spawning MCP server as child process or connecting via HTTP
value.recommendation: Use @ai-sdk/mcp with HTTP transport for production deployments
